message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $15500 for the product. Let me know if you're open to that.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $16500. This is my best price, so let me know if you're interested!

Alice, thanks for your willingness to negotiate. $16500 is still a little higher than my budget allows.  Would you be willing to consider $16000?  I'm really interested in the product, and I believe this price is fair for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand that $16000 is still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $16250. This is as low as I can go, so please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
